actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to exclude from gross income amounts received on the redemption of certain United States savings bonds which are held by the taxpayer for at least 10 years.

summary.text: Amends the Internal Revenue Code to exclude from gross income amounts received on the redemption of any series E or series EE U.S. savings bonds which are held by the taxpayer for at least ten years.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to exclude from gross income amounts received on the redemption of certain United States savings bonds which are held by the taxpayer for at least 10 years.
